backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with shipment, invoice, client, payment, and session data models plus persistent maps, authentication, rate‑limiting, and admin/client session logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that maps old actor state structures to the new format by returning the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high‑level summaries for all frontend files, including UI components, hooks, utilities, and admin/client portal features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing admin and client flows, public tracking, and quote form while managing sessions and backend interactions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin view showing detailed client info with tabs for managing shipments and invoices.
Form for creating or updating a client by principal ID with validation and mutation handling.
Dialog for provisioning a new client account with optional email/mobile and generating a temporary password.
Displays a searchable table of clients and lets admins select a client for details.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard with tabs for clients, adding clients, MSG91 settings, and invoice export, including session validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Exports all invoices as a CSV file using a mutation and triggers a browser download.
Shows a client's invoices, supports creating new invoices, downloading PDFs, and sending WhatsApp reminders.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: UI panel for saving a MSG91 API key and verifying access tokens with backend mutations and result parsing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Admin interface to grant or revoke admin roles using Principal IDs with validation and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Displays a client's shipments and provides a dialog to create new shipments through a form.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Empty file with no implemented component content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen showing an access denied message to unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated card indicating that Internet Identity bootstrap is not available in password-only mode.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Admin login UI allowing password-based authentication with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button that clears the admin session and scrolls to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog that returns null under the new admin flow.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipments and invoices with logout handling and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays a client's invoices with status badges and actions for PDF download and payment, using invoice data fetched from a query.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Provides a form for clients to change their temporary password with validation and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Implements client login via password or OTP, including validation, OTP sending, verification, and authentication flows.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Shows active and delivered shipments for a client, fetched from the backend and grouped into two tables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor bound to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Provides queries and mutations to check admin bootstrap status and initialize the first admin account.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, including login, logout, validation, and local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing the client session token with simple authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin session validation and CRUD operations on clients, shipments, and invoices using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, typography, and custom gold color utilities for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based invoice PDF in a new browser window using invoice metadata.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty module with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep-link message for invoice payment reminders using sanitized mobile numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps backend authentication error messages to user-friendly client-facing messages with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes client identifiers, supporting email and 10‑digit mobile number formats with descriptive error feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, feature requirements, and pending requests related to client login, onboarding, and password flows.
